titleStmt.title: The demands of His Excellency Tho. Lord Fairfax and the Generall Councell of the Army, in prosecution of the late remonstrance to the two houses of Parliament as also against those persons who were the inviters of the late invasion from Scotland, the instigators and encouragers of the late insurrections in this kingdom : with Lieutenant Generall Cromwels letter to His Excellency concerning the executing of justice upon all offenders, and the setling of the kingdom upon a du[e], safe, and hopefull succession of Parliaments.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Army. Council.
Fairfax, Thomas Fairfax, Baron, 1612-1671.
Cromwell, Oliver, 1599-1658.
Rushworth, John, 1612?-1690.

notesStmt.note: "By the appointment of His Excellency the Lord Fairfax Lord Generall, and his Generall Councell of the Army. Signed, John Rushvvorth"
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
